doc:
Margaret Raia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Raia 0 Margaret Raia (1929 – August 17, 2003), also known as Margie Raia, was an American actress with dwarfism, best known for her role as one of the Munchkin villagers in the 1939 film The Wizard of Oz. During production, MGM officials discovered that Raia was underage and as a result she was expelled from the set half way through filming. Her brother, Matthew, also appeared as a munchkin in the film. Raia was born in Long Island, New York in 1929. She died at the age of 74 from a brain seizure in Port Richey, Florida in August 2003. Margaret_Raia ( 1929 – August_17_,_2003 ) , also_known as Margie_Raia , was an_American_actress with dwarfism , best_known for her_role as one of the_Munchkin_villagers in the_1939_film The_Wizard of Oz . During production , MGM_officials discovered that Raia was underage and as a_result she was_expelled from the_set_half_way through filming . Her_brother , Matthew , also appeared as a_munchkin in the_film . Raia was_born in Long_Island , New_York in 1929 . She died at the_age of 74 from a_brain_seizure in Port_Richey , Florida in August_2003 .
